main event: A certified private pilot observed a large, glowing object that descended and ascended rapidly in Cassville, Wisconsin on November 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a point of light 4 miles south of east before growing larger and brighter as it approached.,It was observed through binoculars and described as being completely silent.,The object oscillated as it descended and emitted rapid flashes of light.,At its closest, the object was estimated to be approximately 0.5 miles in diameter and hovered at 1/4 mile above the ground.,The pilot concluded that the object was definitely not any conventional aircraft and suggested it was of extraterrestrial origin.
sighted object: a large, glowing object with a reddish-orange color
